transcription: Kuro Media is here with Michael Murren, the successful coach of the PNG Hunters. You're the Intrast Super Cup Premiers. Did you ever think he'd be the match winner? I didn't think it was Willy. To be honest I thought there was someone else outside of him but he's got some speed but he was on the spot so he just had to do the right thing.  And what were you feeling when the video referee confirmed that try was it elation or relief?  So this is what we're gonna do and kick off some but yeah, and I you know, we go through Michael The crowd is really lapping this up and celebrating behind us. What does it mean to the people here to celebrate this with you guys? Yeah, I think for the fans here today I think you know, they they you know, they came all the way they came in numbers to come and support us But back at home, there'll be a lot of celebrations up there and I'll tell you probably people not going to work and you know, it's rewarding for the people that probably out of remote centers that  Now travel days to find a television screen to watch a game so you know for them They walk back home for one more day or ten hours, you know They'll be certified walking home so and yeah, and it's good for the country right now Just finally are your seasons not done with yet. You've got one more game in Sydney. You're off to the big dance How are you gonna get the boys back up for that after this such a brutal game? That's a another tough Ask again, but you know we will celebrate the victory tonight and go back home and  and go through the formal part of it.
